abstract: Gandhi fears India may welcome Jap invaders; Berlin radio quotes R B Bose statement that Japan refrains from invading India in hope of India pol uprising; Japanese take Putao (Ft Hertz), Burma, in thrust at Allied supply bases, northern India; Jap moves in Burma reptd suggesting India invasion
